Description: Ballistics of 30x165mm sub-caliber BPS round (APDS-T, designation 3UBR8, 53-BM54) as fired from autocannons 2A42, 2A72. Barrel length is 2413-2416mm, travel approximated by subtracting length of cartridge. Chambrage chosen to match cartridge length. Grain geometry is assumed. Projectile weigh approximately 0.304 kg, includes plastic sabot petals holding a 222 gram tungsten-alloy penetrator, held together with an aluminum plug at the bottom. Cartridge loads P-5 BPfl propellant. Accepting a minor increase to the upper limit implied by the 3600 kgf/cm² pressure rating (1.12 * 0.9805 to piezo pressure denoted in MPa), the grain is kept the same with an increase of load to 127 grams. Muzzle velocity figures of 1100, 1115, and 1120 m/s are given in literature.
